entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
